name: CGDataConsumer
desc: An abstraction for data-writing tasks that eliminates the need to manage a raw memory buffer.

items.name: init?(info: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, cbks: UnsafePointer<CGDataConsumerCallbacks>)
items.desc: Creates a data consumer that uses callback functions to write data.

items.name: init?(url: CFURL)
items.desc: Creates a data consumer that writes data to a location specified by a URL.

items.name: init?(data: CFMutableData)
items.desc: Creates a data consumer that writes to a CFData object.

items.name: struct CGDataConsumerCallbacks
items.desc: A structure that contains pointers to callback functions that manage the copying of data for a data consumer.

items.name: typealias CGDataConsumerPutBytesCallback
items.desc: Copies data from a Core Graphics-supplied buffer into a data consumer.

items.name: typealias CGDataConsumerReleaseInfoCallback
items.desc: Releases any private data or resources associated with the data consumer.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for Core Graphics data consumers.
